body_html: @wildcard @ymodak: Just confirmed, I had the same issues as you did with Python 3.7. You need to install Python 3.6.6 or lower in your virtualenv to use tensorflow. Just use google if you don't know how to install a different version of Python in your virtualenv. If you still have questions after that, contact me.

body: @wildcard @ymodak: Just confirmed, I had the same issues as you did with Python 3.7.  You need to install Python 3.6.6 or lower in your virtualenv to use tensorflow.  Just use google if you don't know how to install a different version of Python in your virtualenv.  If you still have questions after that, contact me.
